summary: Sustainability focuses on creating a better future through innovative practices that rejuvenate both the planet and society. It emphasizes decentralized systems, regenerative design, and interconnected ecosystem architecture. This approach aims to transform global challenges by moving away from harmful historical practices towards more resilient and renewable methods. The concept goes beyond mere sustainability, advocating for continuous collaborative efforts that focus on renewal and resilience. It encompasses various fields including innovation, design, and ecosystem management, all working towards a more sustainable and thriving future for all.
excerpt: Innovation should enhance the planet and society. Decentralized, regenerative design can solve global challenges, shifting from harmful practices to resilient, interconnected ecosystems.
